dv-bp-node-001.description: All nodes should have a title
dv-bp-node-001.recommendation: A node title should be added

dv-bp-node-002.description: All success/error JSON nodes should proper colors

dv-bp-logo-001.description: In flow settings, useCustomCSS not set to true
dv-bp-logo-001.recommendation: Use recommended CSS settings for Ping developed flows

dv-bp-logo-002.message: companyLogo class not included in custom CSS
dv-bp-logo-002.description: In flow settings, companyLogo class not included in custom CSS
dv-bp-logo-002.recommendation: Use recommended CSS settings for Ping developed flows

dv-bp-logo-003.description: Found companyLogo environment variable in variables connector, this should be handled in custom CSS settings
dv-bp-logo-003.recommendation: Use recommended CSS settings for Ping developed flows

dv-er-subflow-001.recommendation: Typically caused by having a flow conductor node, but no subflow selected or name mismatch in its configuration

dv-er-subflow-002.message: Circular SubFlow Dependency Found - '%' points back to '%' via subflow
dv-er-subflow-002.recommendation: This can cause export/import errors, it is recommended to return to a parent flow via HTML JSON success/error

dv-er-variable-001.recommendation: This can lead to variables/data to be included in flows that should be removed.

dv-er-variable-002.message: Variable '%' used, but never defined in a Variable connector
dv-er-variable-002.recommendation: This can lead to data that is expected causing undesired results in the flow.

dv-er-teleport-001.recommendation: Teleport start nodes that are not used should be removed from a flow.

dv-er-multi-start-001.message: Node % could be one of multiple start points, or floating
dv-er-multi-start-001.description: Multiple start points or floating node(s) found
dv-er-multi-start-001.recommendation: Ensure flow has one defined start point, and that no nodes are floating (completely disconnected)

dv-bp-debug-off-001.description: In flow settings, log level is currently set to Debug
dv-bp-debug-off-001.recommendation: Change flow log level to Info or None

dv-er-empty-flow-001.description: The flow has no nodes, it is empty
dv-er-empty-flow-001.recommendation: Remove the flow if not in use

dv-rule-advanced-routing-001.message: Advanced Routing Algorithm is turned off
dv-rule-advanced-routing-001.description: In flow settings, Advanced Routing Algorithm is currently turned off
dv-rule-advanced-routing-001.recommendation: Turn the Advanced Routing Algorithm on.

generic-error.description: An unknown error has occurred running the rule.  Please report this error to Solution Innovations team.
generic-error.recommendation: Exclude or ignore this rule for the flow.

dv-bp-annotation-001.message: Annotation color is not in palette [%] (%)
dv-bp-annotation-001.description: Found color not included in best practices list
dv-bp-annotation-001.recommendation: Use recommended CSS settings for Ping developed flows (%)

dv-bp-annotation-002.message: Annotation font is not in sans-serif [%] (%)
dv-bp-annotation-002.description: Found non-standard fontFamily used for Annotation

dv-bp-annotation-003.description: It is a best practice to include annotations to document your flow

dv-bp-missing-title-annotation-001.message: Each flow should contain a title annotation node with a background color of #4462ed

dv-bp-title-not-on-top-001.message: The topmost node in your flow should be a title annotation (%)
dv-bp-title-not-on-top-001.description: Title annotation not on top of flow
dv-bp-title-not-on-top-001.recommendation: Position title annotation at top of the flow
